filmography.title: Adam's Rib
filmography.role_description: A seductive, bubble-headed mistress whose involvement in a shooting sparks the film's central legal battle; Hagen's film debut.
filmography.plot: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

filmography.title: Ambush
filmography.role_description: A frontier woman caught up in an Apache uprising in this Western drama.
filmography.plot: A scout is hired to rescue a white woman who has been held captive by Apaches for years.

filmography.title: Side Street
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer and small-time criminal associate who complicates the protagonist's life.
filmography.plot: A part-time carrier for the post office steals money that belongs to racketeers, putting his life in danger.

filmography.title: The Asphalt Jungle
filmography.role_description: The devoted, long-suffering girlfriend of a hooligan who stands by him even as their heist plans crumble.
filmography.plot: A major jewel heist is planned and executed, but bad luck and double crosses cause the operation to fall apart.

filmography.title: A Life of Her Own
filmography.role_description: A supportive friend to an aspiring model who gets caught in a tragic affair.
filmography.plot: A small-town girl moves to New York to become a model and falls in love with a married man.

filmography.title: Night Into Morning
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic neighbor who tries to help a grieving professor dealing with the death of his family.
filmography.plot: A college professor spirals into alcoholism and depression after his wife and son are killed in a fire.

filmography.title: No Questions Asked
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a lawyer who gets involved with the mob to secure a future for them.
filmography.plot: A lawyer desperate for money to marry his girlfriend becomes a middleman for mob insurance scams.

filmography.title: The People Against O'Hara
filmography.role_description: The loyal but conflicted girlfriend of a man wrongly accused of murder.
filmography.plot: A defense attorney with a drinking problem takes on a murder case to defend an innocent man.

filmography.title: Shadow in the Sky
filmography.role_description: The wife of a man trying to help her shell-shocked brother reintegrate into society.
filmography.plot: A Korean War veteran suffering from PTSD tries to rebuild his life while living with his sister and her family.

filmography.title: Singin' in the Rain
filmography.role_description: A silent film diva with a screechy voice who struggles to transition to talkies; her most iconic and acclaimed role.
filmography.plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination â€“ Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Carbine Williams
filmography.role_description: The devoted wife of the real-life inventor of the M1 carbine rifle, who supports him while he is in prison.
filmography.plot: The biography of David Marshall Williams, who invented a new rifle mechanism while serving time for murder.

filmography.title: Arena
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of a rodeo star who wants him to quit the dangerous sport.
filmography.plot: A rodeo rider tries to reconcile with his wife and survive the dangers of the arena.

filmography.title: Latin Lovers
filmography.role_description: The supportive secretary to a wealthy heiress looking for love in Brazil.
filmography.plot: A wealthy woman travels to Brazil to find a man who loves her for herself, not her money.

filmography.title: Half a Hero
filmography.role_description: A suburban housewife who pressures her husband into a lifestyle they cannot afford.
filmography.plot: A writer tries to balance his budget and his wife's desire for a suburban home.

filmography.title: The Big Knife
filmography.role_description: A flirtatious neighbor who complicates the life of a conflicted Hollywood actor.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood actor wants to quit the business to save his marriage, but a studio boss blackmails him into staying.

filmography.title: Spring Reunion
filmography.role_description: A friend of the protagonist who encourages her to rekindle an old high school romance.
filmography.plot: A woman attends her high school reunion and reconnects with the man who was once voted 'most likely to succeed'.

filmography.title: The Shaggy Dog
filmography.role_description: The wife of a mailman who is terrified of dogs, adding comedic conflict to the story.
filmography.plot: A boy is cursed by an ancient ring that transforms him into a sheepdog at inconvenient times.

filmography.title: Sunrise at Campobello
filmography.role_description: The devoted personal secretary to Franklin D. Roosevelt during his struggle with polio.
filmography.plot: The story of Franklin D. Roosevelt's battle with polio and his return to politics.

filmography.title: Panic in Year Zero!
filmography.role_description: A mother trying to keep her family together and civilized while society collapses after a nuclear attack.
filmography.plot: A family leaves Los Angeles for a fishing trip just before a nuclear bomb destroys the city, forcing them to survive in a lawless world.

filmography.title: Dead Ringer
filmography.role_description: The greedy, suspicious girlfriend of a man involved with twin sisters, one of whom is a murderer.
filmography.plot: A wealthy woman is murdered by her twin sister, who then assumes her identity.

filmography.title: Fear No Evil
filmography.role_description: A woman involved with an antique mirror that holds a supernatural secret in this television movie.
filmography.plot: A man discovers a magic mirror that can bring back the dead, but at a terrible price.

filmography.title: Ritual of Evil
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this sequel to 'Fear No Evil', continuing the supernatural investigation themes.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist investigates the mysterious death of a patient involved in the occult.

filmography.title: Starsky and Hutch
filmography.role_description: A memorable role in the feature-length pilot movie for the iconic 70s cop show.
filmography.plot: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Gran Torino.

filmography.title: That's Entertainment!
filmography.role_description: Hagen's performance as Lina Lamont is prominently featured in this celebration of MGM's history.
filmography.plot: A documentary celebrating the 50th anniversary of MGM, featuring clips from its most famous musical films.

filmography.title: Alexander: The Other Side of Dawn
filmography.role_description: A small role in this drama about a young man on the streets of Hollywood; Hagen's final film role.
filmography.plot: A young man tries to make a living on the streets of Hollywood while avoiding the dangers of the city.
